joys.name: Fenella Powell

quote.message: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quote.name: A.A. Milne

joys.message:
Good Morning @channel
I thought I would pop in and start the ‚ú® Daily Joy Challenge ‚ú®
Every morning one member of the cohort posts some motivational / inspirational / words of their own or a quote, along with a song of their choice to bring some joy to the cohort for the day
My choice of song as a classic wake up song Walking on Sunshine
My go to quote is also this one
‚ÄúYou are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.‚Äù - A.A. Milne
I tag @Benedict to bring in the joy tomorrow! Have a great day!

joys.name: Benedict Valuks

quote.message: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quote.name: Thomas A. Edison

joys.message:
Good morning everyone!
I'm feeling energised after my cycle ride in.
It is my turn this morning to bring the joy in the ‚ú® Daily Joy Challenge ‚ú®
Firstly, I'd like to thank everyone for their support so far. I am very excited about the journey ahead.My choice of song is Mr Blue Sky by The Electric Light Orchestra. It is one of my absolute favourite songs and is nothing but positive vibes.
For my quote, I have chosen one which I think is is quite applicable to coding:‚ÄúI have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.‚Äù
‚Äï Thomas A. EdisonI hope everyone has a great day!

joys.name: Rikie Patrick

quote.message: There is still a lot to learn and there is always great stuff out there. Even mistakes can be wonderful
quote.name: Robin Williams

joys.message:
Thanks @Benedict for the nomination in the ‚ú® Daily Joy Challenge ‚ú®
I would also like to echo Ben's words from yesterday. Don't ever be afraid to reach out for help and support if you need it. Looking forward to the next 4 months and beyond.
My choice of song comes from a trio I have seen many times. Their sets always fill the room with such happiness and euphoria! Zo√´ Johnston features with stunning vocals on a song by Above and Beyond called ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre All We Need‚Äù.
My inspirational quote comes from an incredible actor; the late, great and talented Robin Williams who dedicated his life to putting smile on other peoples face.
‚ÄúThere is still a lot to learn and there is always great stuff out there. Even mistakes can be wonderful‚Äù
 ‚Äï Robin Williams
@Ellie Priestley ü´µ You're up next!
Have an awesome day! üëã

joys.name: Ellie Priestley

quote.message: The rest is just as important as the work

joys.message:
Thanks for the nomination @Rikie Patrick, and happy Friday everyone!
So crazy to think we're almost at the end of our first week! Hope everyone is feeling positive and ready for an amazing weekend! ‚ò∫Ô∏èWith that theme in mind, my quote for ‚ú®Daily Joy Challenge‚ú® today is:
"The rest is just as important as the work"
I've had to remind myself of this constantly this week - it's so easy to get hooked on the challenges and before you know it hours have passed! Remember we're only a week into our four months, and that it's a marathon rather than a sprint. Let's make sure to all take some time this weekend to recharge and reset so we can all be energised for next week ü•≥Following on from the Friday theme, my song of the day pick is "September" by Earth, Wind & Fire: an absolute classic Friday bop üï∫
My nomination for Monday is @Kumani! Have a restful weekend all and see you soon üí´
